creditline: Gift of Edith and Norman Garmezy
description: lane with several buildings on right; laundry on line; women in doorway; part of windmill and country side in distance; wall on left; building at end of wall; sign on building: ARUNDEL
inscription:
Signature and Inscription

LLC, in pencil: [M.B.W. 5277]
provenance: Edith and Norman Garmezy, Edina, Minnesota.  The Garmezys do not recall how they acquired these etchings.
signed: below image, right, in pencil: [Frank Short]
title: A Lane in Arundel
